socialCapitalQuestions.question: What rights do households in this community have over this parcel?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: What rights do households in this community have over this parcel?

options.opt: Right to access and use the parcel
options.optHindi: Right to access and use the parcel

options.opt: Right to benefit from the parcel
options.optHindi: Right to benefit from the parcel

options.opt: Right to control how the parcel will be used
options.optHindi: Right to control how the parcel will be used

options.opt: Right to exclude others from unauthorized use of the parcel
options.optHindi: Right to exclude others from unauthorized use of the parcel

options.opt: Right to pass rights to the parcel down to future generations or sell rights to others
options.optHindi: Right to pass rights to the parcel down to future generations or sell rights to others

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Are the boundaries for this parcel well known and understood by government authorities and/or community members?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Are the boundaries for this parcel well known and understood by government authorities and/or community members?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Does this group feel confident that they will be able to continue to use the parcel for this land use without constraints indefinitely into the future?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Does this group feel confident that they will be able to continue to use the parcel for this land use without constraints indefinitely into the future?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Are there any current disputes related to the boundaries or rights associated with this parcel?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Are there any current disputes related to the boundaries or rights associated with this parcel?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: If the resource rights are not legally recognized, do households in this community use the parcel and access the resource based upon locally recognized customary norms?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: If the resource rights are not legally recognized, do households in this community use the parcel and access the resource based upon locally recognized customary norms?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Is there a group or committee in this community with specific responsibility to manage or oversee matters related to use of this parcel?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Is there a group or committee in this community with specific responsibility to manage or oversee matters related to use of this parcel?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Are there rules and regulations associated with this parcel that were created by the community itself?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Are there rules and regulations associated with this parcel that were created by the community itself?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Do all stakeholders within the community generally have equal access to the parcel?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Do all stakeholders within the community generally have equal access to the parcel?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Does the management group include representatives from all segments of the community?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Does the management group include representatives from all segments of the community?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: Are the rules and regulations associated with this parcel generally viewed as fair and legitimate?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: Are the rules and regulations associated with this parcel generally viewed as fair and legitimate?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: How long have the institutions for this parcel been operating?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: How long have the institutions for this parcel been operating?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: How often are decisions made by the committee ignored or not implemented?
socialCapitalQuestions.questionHindi: How often are decisions made by the committee ignored or not implemented?

socialCapitalQuestions.question: How much of your community's livelihoods is generated by this parcel?
